title: notocactus
author: notocactus
content: Rules are easyMeet the allowed ranks: From Jr. Member rank to Senior member rank. Members at higher ranks (Hero, Legendary) are not accepted.Important condition: You're not suspected spammerI will give each eligible applicant 1 merit for your effort UNTIL next 4 hoursIt is to find potentially quality members. You see, I am not a suspected spammer  Let's go with the bird!  And I found a bug  theymos please fix the bug. Suspected spammer only shows if a member replies in topics not created by his/ herself. Spammer is spammer no matter where he/she makes post. The message has a bug.Fix it please

comments.author: Nheer
comments.body: I don’t meet the rank requirements but I want to try too.

comments.author: Cryptomiles1
comments.body: Please could you make it more clear for me?If i may know, do we locate those with suspected spammer or what are the basic task to qualify.Sorry if my questions gets you angry

comments.author: StarKay
comments.body: Just saw your post, I've been a member for years and I do contribute from time to time. I've become better with time and I would want to try. I have to score 10 on the captcha game to make this post.

comments.author: sheenshane
comments.body: I am not a suspected spammer!Quote from: tranthidung on April 01, 2023, 01:28:24 PMtheymos please fix the bug. Suspected spammer only shows if a member replies in topics not created by his/ herself. Spammer is spammer no matter where he/she makes post. The message has a bug.I knew ain't accepted and but please let me interfere with your post. I'm quite late on this but it seems you're right I saw other members don't have a message above.

comments.author: Wapfika
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptomiles1 on April 01, 2023, 01:39:40 PMPlease could you make it more clear for me?If i may know, do we locate those with suspected spammer or what are the basic task to qualify.Sorry if my questions gets you angryJust simply post here if you don’t have the spammer red tag above your post and meet the rank requirements.Applying for this too.  Just recently grind 11 coins for this just to satisfy your requirements OP!

comments.author: Dzwaafu11
comments.body: I solved the captcha too.I wish I'll be lucky too meet up the requirement

comments.author: SmartGold01
comments.body: I wish to qualify as welllove you all.

comments.author: notocactus
comments.body: Some handled the bird in this thread and are not suspected spammers here but they are in other threads. Strictly, those posters are not qualified but it's fun and I gave them 1 merit all.Enjoy small spree. Because of lack of interest in, I lock the thread now. Have a happy day with the bird!  You know, 19 coins collected for this post.
